Inherent Glamour.name: Inherent Glamour
Inherent Glamour.blurb: Neeko can look like an ally champion. Champion combat or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.
Inherent Glamour.description: Innate: Neeko is offered a selection of  allied champions to take their appearance. Once selected, there's a 2.5 seconds delay before another champion can be selected.
Inherent Glamour.description2: While disguised, Neeko can use basic attacks while keeping her form. Taking damage from enemy champions, or casting either  Blooming Burst or  Tangle-Barbs breaks the illusion and puts Inherent Glamour on  cooldown.
Inherent Glamour.description3: When disguised, Neeko can select herself to deactivate her disguise, putting Inherent Glamour on a 2-second  cooldown.
Inherent Glamour.notes:
* Neeko will copy aesthetics as well as superficial mechanical Statistics. She will fake a number of readings:
 Health bar (original's current amount becomes her apparent maximum)
 Secondary resource - e.g. mana, energy or none at all (original's current amount becomes her apparent maximum)
 Statistics
 Buffs and debuffs with their respective icons and VFX
 Kill feed icon

A number of attributes she actually adopts are:
 Default transformation toggle (non-innate)
 Voice lines
 Character interactions (Jokes, taunts, dances, laughs, toggle effects), as well as their  Recall animation
 Base movement speed
 Attack range (will not adopt longer attack range)

Blooming Burst.name: Blooming Burst
Blooming Burst.blurb: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.
Blooming Burst.description: Active: Neeko propels a seed into a target area dealing  magic damage to enemies within.
Blooming Burst.description2: If the seed kills an enemy unit or damages a champion or large monster, it will bloom again after a short delay to deal magic damage. This cannot happen more than twice per Blooming Burst.
Blooming Burst.leveling2: Second and Third Bloom Damage:35 / 55 / 75 / 95 / 115 (+ 20% AP)Total Maximum Damage:140 / 225 / 310 / 395 / 480 (+ 90% AP)

Shapesplitter.name: Shapesplitter
Shapesplitter.description: Passive: Basic attacks on-hit grant Neeko a stack of Shapesplitter, up to a maximum of two. At 2 stacks, Neeko's next basic attack on-attack consumes the stacks to turn her attack into a  non-projectile, dealing bonus magic damage and granting her  bonus movement speed for 1 second.
Shapesplitter.leveling:
Bonus Magic Damage:50 / 70 / 90 / 110 / 130 (+ 60% AP)
Passive Movement Speed:10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30%
Shapesplitter.description2: Active: Neeko becomes  invisible for 0.5 seconds, sending a temporary clone of her  current form sprinting in the target direction for 3 seconds and up to 900 units away. The clone is  untargetable for the first 0.5 seconds.
Shapesplitter.description3: Both Neeko and the clone gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.
Shapesplitter.notes: * The clone travels in the target direction until it runs into terrain.

Tangle-Barbs.name: Tangle-Barbs
Tangle-Barbs.description: Active: Neeko slings a magical spiral in a target direction, dealing magic damage and  rooting enemies it passes through.
Tangle-Barbs.description2: If Tangle-Barbs hits at least one enemy, it grows in size and speed, and the root duration is increased.

Pop Blossom.name: Pop Blossom
Pop Blossom.description: Active: Neeko winds up over 1.25 seconds, creating a zone around her. The zone is invisible to enemies while she is  disguised.
Pop Blossom.description2: Neeko then  shields herself for 2 seconds, increased for each enemy champion nearby, as she leaps into the air for 0.6 seconds.
Pop Blossom.leveling2: Shield:50 / 65 / 80 / 95 / 110 (+ 50% AP)Bonus Shield Per Champion:40 / 50 / 60 / 70 / 80 (+ 40% AP)Maximum Shield:250 / 315 / 380 / 445 / 510 (+ 250% AP)
Pop Blossom.description3: Upon landing, Neeko bursts with spiritual energy, dealing magic damage and  stunning nearby enemies for 1.25 seconds.
Pop Blossom.notes: *  Stasis will not cancel Pop Blossom and can be activated during the wind up but not during the leap.
